definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Barbara agreed to conduct the meeting pending the election of a permanent chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉同意主持那個會議直到選舉出常務主席。

sentences.english: Barbara came a cropper when her business failed.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉破產了，她栽了個大跟頭。

sentences.english: The railroad finally reached Santa Barbara in 1877.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路終於在1877年修到了聖巴巴拉。

sentences.english: You could have stayed with Barbara.
sentences.chinese: 你本可以和巴巴拉住在一起。

sentences.english: Now I want to get my further education in Santa Barbara City College.
sentences.chinese: 現在我想去聖巴巴拉城市學院繼續深造。

sentences.english: Barbary was working in Aubury, where she went daily in a bus.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉在奧伯裏工作，每天得坐公共汽車去上班。

sentences.english: It is the perfect example of Santa Barbara indoor and outdoor living.
sentences.chinese: 這是聖巴巴拉室內和戶外生活的完美例子。

sentences.english: Oh, did you? You could have stayed with Babara.
sentences.chinese: 是嗎？你本來能夠和巴巴拉住在一起的。

definition: O'Connor (name)/Thomas Power O'Connor (1848-1929), Irish journalist and nationalist political leader
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
